name: Square
description: Interact with Square's API for payments, orders, and business management

env.name: Square API Access Token
env.description: Your Square API access token used for authenticating requests to Square.

env.name: Use Square Sandbox
env.description: Set to 'true' to use the Square sandbox (test) environment.

env.name: Use Square Production
env.description: Set to 'true' to use the Square production environment.

env.name: Disallow Writes
env.description: If set to 'true', restricts API to read-only operations.

env.name: Square API Version
env.description: Specify the Square API version to use (e.g., 2025-04-16).
